data.title: The Andy Roberts FAQ
data.meta_description: Andy Roberts Frequently Asked Questions FAQ about music cricket racing etc etc
data.text:
Because I do play the guitar, am a fan of both Roy and Nick Harper , and initiated the usenet newsgroup alt.fan.bonzo-dog I am often asked if I am Andy Roberts the musician who has had a long and illustrious recording career involving the Liverpool Scene, Scaffold, Iain Mathews, Roy Harper, the Rutles etc. I have never, however, accompanied Roy, toured with Neil Innes, nor been in a band with Paul McCartney's brother.

I can throw a cricket ball about 10 yards before my arm falls off.

Other Andy Roberts on the Web ( not by any means exhaustive ):

Andrew Roberts, British Historian, biographer and media personality

http://www.andrew-roberts.net/

has been on BBC Any Questions

Another Author..

Andy Roberts, The astonishingly Fast Bowler for the West Indies

http://www.changes.com/antigua/agcri01.htm

http://www.trytel.com/~chas/players/roberts.htm

Andy Roberts, footballer formerly of Crystal Palace, now Wimbledon. http://www.fa-carling.com/club/wfc/roberts.html

Andrew Roberts, lecturer in Sociology at Middlesex University

http://www.mdx.ac.uk/www/study/homepage.htm

Andy Roberts the actor

http://www.archwaytheatre.co.uk/profiles/andyroberts.htm

Andy Roberts, the racqueteball player ( What's racqueteball?):

http://www.uspra.com/irt/roberts.html

Andy Roberts, the golfer:

http://www.messenger-inquirer.com/localsports/e2084.htm ( no longer available )

Andy Roberts, a musician: ( website not finished) http://www.cyberscape.net/users/aroberts/aprtemp.htm

Andy Roberts a musician who played guitar for Liverpool Scene, The Scaffold, Bonzos, Roy Harper, Pink Floyd etc.

http://home.t-online.de/home/Norbert.Knape/liver.htm http://home.luna.nl/~poetry/part/85/

http://www.delerium.co.uk/archive/uk6070s/r4.html

http://www22.pair.com/taxim/items/tx2002.htm

http://www.eastcentralone.com/plainsong/plainsong.html

http://www.bilpin.co.uk/stormcock/bbc.htm

http://www.helsinki.fi/~akoskine/royharper/gallery/torness.html

Andy Roberts the author of this FAQ and maintainer of the alt.fan.bonzo-dogFAQ

Q. So what do all these Andy Robertses look like.

A. Mostly different: See Here & Here

If you are called Andy Roberts or have any more information or comments about this FAQ then please drop me a line at mailto:aroberts@gmail.com. Here are

Some have done this already:-

Andy Roberts HM Customs and Excise Officer in Southend-on-Sea <AndrewR @ hmce.gsi.gov.uk>

Andrew Roberts, North WisconsinThrasher

Andy John Roberts a Civil Engineer from Adelaide, South Australia andrew.roberts@student.adelaide.edu.au

Andrew Roberts, lives in Denver, currently working for westinghouse in Salt Lake City. "Roberts, Andrew V" <RobertAV@westinghouse.com>

Andy Roberts from Boston, MA, United States - aroberts@bowstreet.com link - http://www.bowstreet.com/company/andy_roberts.htm

A colleague of Shawn Dill - andy@quiropracticamundial.com

"my name is Andrew A. Roberts I live in Columbus Ohio usa. My father and grandfather also have the same name " "andrew roberts" <arober@columbus.rr.com>

I was sent an email years ago from someone looking for a particular Andrew Roberts. The sender had obtained a list of email addresses and here they are, all 171 of them! :-
